Related Character(s): 狖, 猿, 猨
Связанный символ (и): 狖, ape, 猨

貁字的基本解释

貁
yòu
古同“狖”，黑色的长臂猿。
鼬鼠之类的动物，能捕鼠。

貁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yòu］
同“狖1”。
黑色的长尾猿。

貁字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豸字部】　貁； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1200第26
【唐韻】【集韻】?余救切，音蜏。【說文】䑕屬，善旋。【廣雅】?，貁也。【玉篇】猿屬。【前漢·揚雄傳】蝯貁擬而不敢下。【註】師古曰：貁似猴，卬鼻而長尾。【正字通】貁，黑猿。《倉頡篇》曰：似貍。　【集韻】或作狖。

貁字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
貁字的起名意思

暂无。

Scorpion
Basic explanation of words
Scorpion
yòu
The ancient same "snake", the black gibbon.
Animals like weasel can catch rats.
Scorpion
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yòu］
Same as "狖1".
The black globose.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Zizi Department】　貁; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1200 Page 26
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Jiuqie, Yinxu. [Said the text] Qi is, good spin. [Guang Ya]?, Yao Ye. [Jade articles] Apes. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Kui Tu did not dare to download. [Note] Shigu said: The dragon is like a monkey, with its nose and tail. 【Zhengzitong】Tao, black ape. "Cangjie Pian" says: like a raccoon dog.　【Jiyun】Or make a slap.
